rounds.comments: (Alex: We will list the 7 tiles that will be in your rack, and we'll also give you a clue to the word you have to come up with.)

clues.text:
T, U, N, S, I, E, Q:
A judicial investigation of a death

E, W, S, B, O, 2 Rs:
A website access tool

2 As, R, B, S, D, N:
An underwater ridge in a river

O, G, N, 2 As, P, R:
A model of excellence

2 Vs, 2 Es, D, L, O:
To delegate or to deteriorate
